message.author: Philippe Escande
message.title: Microsoft-Apple : « L’intelligence artificielle est le nouveau ring sur lequel s’affrontent les géants de la technologie »
message.description: OpenAI, la firme dirigée par Sam Altman, est devenue incontournable. Tout le secteur tombe sous son charme... Sauf Scarlett Johansson, qui n’a pas apprécié que la voix dont est désormais dotée la dernière version de GPT-4 lui ressemble de manière troublante. …
message.content:
A Boston, le 8 décembre 2023. MICHAEL DWYER / AP
Il y a des rivalités qui ne séteignent jamais. Elles sensommeillent, puis resurgissent quand loccasion sy prête. Dans le monde de linformatique, la p… [+2466 chars]

message.author: Alex Wilhelm
message.title: Watch: When did iPads get as expensive as MacBooks?
message.description: Would you switch out your MacBook for an iPad with an M4 chip and OLED display? With the increase in price, Apple seems to be arguing these are comparable but we’re curious to see if consumers will make the change.
message.content: Apple’s iPad event had a lot to like. New iPads with new chips and new sizes, a new Apple Pencil, and even some software updates. If you are a big fan of Apple hardware, well, it was probably a good … [+1385 chars]

message.author: Equipe InfoMoney
message.title: Warren Buffett vende ações da Apple e explica por que reduziu fatia em 13%
message.description: Participação na gigante de tecnologia passou a US$ 135 bilhões em março; números foram divulgados antes da reunião anual, neste sábado (4)
message.content: O conglomerado do megainvestidor Warren Buffett, Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.B), vendeu US$ 38,9 bilhões em ações da Apple (AAPL) entre dezembro do ano passado e março deste ano. Os números foram revelad… [+2530 chars]

message.author: GQ
message.title: Apple Neuheiten: Was wir vor der ersten Keynote 2021 wissen!
message.description: Bald soll es so weit sein: Bei der ersten Keynote 2021 präsentiert Apple Neues aus Cupertino. Auf diese Produkte dürfen wir uns freuen!
message.content: Auf eines ist im Frühjahr immer Verlass: Apple präsentiert seine (ersten) neuen Produkte. Glauben wir den jüngsten Gerüchten, wird das auch 2021 so sein und dieses Jahr sogar wieder live aus Cupertin… [+2936 chars]

message.title: Akram's yorkers, Hegg's hits, and Chapple's 6 for 18 | ESPNcricinfo.com
message.description: This week, we relive the glorious one-day triumphs of Lancashire in the 1990s | ESPNcricinfo.com
message.content: With still no live cricket in sight, we're digging deep into YouTube to keep ourselves entertained. This week, a trip down memory lane with one of the most dominant one-day sides ever - Lancashire in… [+5185 chars]
